language.entry: - What is this?! - {colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS WE ARE FINALLY DYING.{colour_end}
- My body is becoming ethereal?! - {colour_start|bleed}OUR BODY.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}WE DEFY NATURE. NOW OUR PHYSICAL FORM BEGINS TO FADE!{colour_end}
- My body returns to normal. - {colour_start|bleed}IT WILL FADE AGAIN.{colour_end}
A strange effect. I must find a solution soon...
{colour_start|bleed}THE BODY IS PHYSICAL ONCE MORE.{colour_end}
- You rabid dog! Be still! - {colour_start|bleed}SUDDEN SENSATION!{colour_end}
- Some cosmic force possesses me! - {colour_start|bleed}IT IS THRILLING!{colour_end}
- A sudden rush of adrenaline, what is the cause?! - {colour_start|bleed}BLOODLUST!{colour_end}
- My senses return to me. - {colour_start|bleed}BRING IT BACK!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THE COSMIC THRILL FADES. I MUST HAVE IT ONCE MORE!{colour_end}
My emotions, and this spirit, are now contained.
- I am sheathed in some ghastly aura! - {colour_start|bleed}PROTECTION FROM DEATH!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}WE TRANSCEND PHYSICALITY. WE ARE INVINCIBLE!{colour_end} - Quiet, phantom.
{colour_start|bleed}THE MORTAL FORM GAINS OUR PHANTASMAL RESILIENCE!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}WE ARE KILLABLE AGAIN, PERHAPS FOR THE BEST.{colour_end} - . . .
The protection fades. Perhaps I can harness it...
- The phantasmal resistance is gone... - {colour_start|bleed}OUR FRAGILE BODY RETURNS.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS WE SHALL FADE FROM THIS WORLD, SISTER.{colour_end} - No.
{colour_start|bleed}WE ARE AN UNHOLY THING, HAUNTING THESE WRETCHED LANDS!{colour_end}
- An unforseen boon. - {colour_start|bleed}THIS IS NO BOON. THIS IS A CURSE.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WE REMAIN UNTOUCHABLE.{colour_end}
- This protection continues to aid me. - {colour_start|bleed}BUT FOR HOW LONG?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}PROTECTED FROM DEATH, I COULD SLAY A GOD!{colour_end}
- Self preservation is what matters most. - {colour_start|bleed}SO SELFISH, SISTER!{colour_end}
- a formidable defense will win a battle. - {colour_start|bleed}NOT WITHOUT AN UNSTOPPABLE OFFENSE.{colour_end}
- We will both perish if we are not careful! - {colour_start|bleed}SO BE IT!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WE OUTNUMBER THEM. THEY ARE CONFUSED AS TO WHO TO TARGET.{colour_end}
- My cunning allows me an upper hand. - {colour_start|bleed}YOU PLAY DIRTY TRICKS, SISTER.{colour_end}
I have casted a malediction upon them. Their senses fade.
{colour_start|bleed}MY SPITEFUL SOUL SAPS THEM OF THEIR ESSENCE.{colour_end}
- They grow weak, easy to dispatch. - {colour_start|bleed}EASY TO SLAUGHTER.{colour_end}
My curse is cast. Their strength is sapped.
Their fate is sealed, their blood will eat them from within.
I am manipulator of life, and those who oppose me will fall.
{colour_start|bleed}THE WOUNDS I INFLICT. THEY BEGIN TO FESTER AND CORRUPT.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}LET THE WAR TRUMPETS SOUND!{colour_end} - Delusional geist.
- Fight, if you wish to survive. - {colour_start|bleed}KILL. IF YOU WISH TO LIVE.{colour_end}
- You know I am a queen, so fight for me as loyal soldiers. - {colour_start|bleed}AS LOYAL SLAVES.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}THIS BODY IS NOTHING. IT CAN BE PUSHED TO UNNATURAL LIMITS.{colour_end}
Pain is a weakness, and I am immune to it.
- {colour_start|bleed}PAIN BRINGS ME ONLY PLEASURE.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}"PICK AT THE SCAB - SEPTIC BLOOD STARTS TO WEEP!"{colour_end} - Silence.
- {colour_start|bleed}"BLACKHEAD AND BOILS, PUSTULAR CYSTS!"{colour_end} -Stop your cacophonous wailing.
- {colour_start|bleed}"PIERCE THE BLADE - INFECTED TISSUE STARTS TO BLEED!"{colour_end} - . . .
{colour_start|bleed}YOU TOOK MY LIFE! YOU WILL PAY FOR WHAT YOU HAVE DONE!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}HOW COULD YOU?! WE WERE SISTERS!{colour_end} - You were always better! I had to secure my place!
- You were always the better one! I despised you! - {colour_start|bleed}NOW YOU PAY THE PRICE!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}THE TIME HAS COME, SISTER! YOU WILL PAY FOR WHAT YOU DID!{colour_end} - You will submit!
- {colour_start|bleed}AT LAST, YOUR SPIRIT IS BROKEN!{colour_end} - No! I am still strong! I will remain dominant!
- {colour_start|bleed}I WILL HAVE WHAT YOU STOLE FROM ME!{colour_end} - You are a tyrant! You never deserved to live!
{colour_start|bleed}I HAVE BEEN OPPRESSED LONG ENOUGH! IT IS TIME I RULE ONCE MORE!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE THE CURSE, SISTER. YOU WILL PERISH.{colour_end} - You will be shackled, fiend!
- No! No! This can't... - {colour_start|bleed}YES!{colour_end}
- I was always in your shadow! This time, I will be stronger! - {colour_start|bleed}WORDS OF A FOOL!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}WE WERE SISTERS! WE RULED SIDE BY SIDE!{colour_end} - I merely existed in your shadow!
- I am in control! - {colour_start|bleed}I AM IN CONTROL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WE HAD NOTHING BUT EACH OTHER! HOW COULD YOU BETRAY OUR BOND!?{colour_end}
We were equal once, but our rise through society had favored you!
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ROBBED ME OF SENSATION, AND SOON I SHALL DO THE SAME TO YOU!{colour_end}
- I am in control! You will obey me! - {colour_start|bleed}YOU OVERESTIMATE YOUR POWER, SISTER.{colour_end}
- You were my responsibility! I did what had to be done! - {colour_start|bleed}LIES!{colour_end}
Obey, spirit! You are but a rabid animal that must be put down!
{colour_start|bleed}I'VE WAITED AN ETERNITY FOR THIS OPPORTUNITY, I WILL FINALLY BE FREED OF YOUR IMPRISONMENT, SISTER!{colour_end}
- You are at fault for your fate, spirit! - {colour_start|bleed}WORDS OF THE GUILTY.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}EITHER YOU DIE OR WE BOTH DIE, SISTER.{colour_end} - I would gladly choose the latter!
- {colour_start|bleed}LOOK AT THESE PAWNS. THEY AID US DESPITE WHAT IS BEFORE THEIR EYES.{colour_end} - Be silent!
- {colour_start|bleed}WHEN I AM FREE OF YOU, I WILL PAINT THIS WORLD A BEAUTIFUL RED.{colour_end} - . . .
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE NOT COLD, SISTER. YOU ARE WARM WITH HATRED, AS I AM!{colour_end} - Meaningless words...
- {colour_start|bleed}WHAT CAUSED YOU TO COMMIT SUCH HEINOUS ACTS, SISTER? HATRED? JEALOUSY? FEAR?{colour_end} - . . .
{colour_start|bleed}I WAS ALWAYS BETTER. YOU KNEW IT, SO YOU KILLED ME.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE ALL CANVASES, WAITING TO BE PAINTED RED.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}DO YOU HEAR YOUR HEART, SISTER? DO YOU HEAR HOW IT PUMPS FOR ME?{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}EVEN NOW, YOUR CONTROL LOOSENS. SOON YOU WILL FADE.{colour_end} - An empty threat...
{colour_start|bleed}WHY DO YOU RESIST, SISTER? ARE YOU NOT TIRED OF THE BURDENS YOU CARRY?{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}BLOOD! LET ME TASTE THEIR BLOOD!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}COME, SISTER! LET ME SHOW YOU THE THRILL I FEEL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ONLY OBSERVE, SISTER! IT IS TIME TO TAKE ACTION!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LET THE BLOOD PUMP! LET ME FEEL IT AGAIN!{colour_end}
- Obey me, spirit! - {colour_start|bleed}OBEY ME, SISTER.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I YEARN TO HAVE LIFE BLOOD FLOW THROUGH MY FINGERS ONCE MORE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THIS BODY IS MINE, AND I WILL GO WHERE I PLEASE!{colour_end}
- No! Stop! - {colour_start|bleed}DO NOT RESIST ME!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I AM MOST ALIVE IN THE FACE OF DANGER!{colour_end}
Foolish spectre! You will obey me!
We are not equals! My will triumphs over yours!
I am master of my own mind and body!
You are but a tool, and a tool does not resist its user!
You are an animal, driven only by impulse!
I am the deserved queen of this world, and no creature will disobey me!
Submit, fiend!
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU WERE ALWAYS MANIPULATIVE, SISTER!{colour_end} - It is my right to rule!
- I am powerful! I am stronger! - {colour_start|bleed}FOR NOW.{colour_end}
- You will do as I command! - {colour_start|bleed}NEVER!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE TOO STRICT, SISTER. LET IMPULSE TAKE CONTROL!{colour_end}
- You are chaos! You destroy without reason! - {colour_start|bleed}THAT IS THE ONLY JOY OF LIFE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}FIGHT WITHOUT DIRECTION, SISTER! YOU WILL FINALLY UNDERSTAND WHAT I FEEL!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU FIGHT YOUR NATURE, SISTER!{colour_end} - I do what I will!
- Obey my commands! - {colour_start|bleed}I WILL NEVER OBEY A TYRANT!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}SO MANIPULATIVE. SO CONTROLLING. IT IS TIME I BECOME QUEEN!{colour_end}
I am destined to rule over all, and a petty spirit will not hinder me!
{colour_start|bleed}WHAT IS WRONG, SISTER? DO YOU FIND IT HARD TO GAIN CONTROL?{colour_end}
- I am in control! - {colour_start|bleed}I AM IN CONTROL!{colour_end}
- You are a parasite, feeding off my essence! - {colour_start|bleed}YOU MISREMEMBER, SISTER.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}DO YOU NOT REMEMBER, SISTER? WHAT TRULY HAPPENED THAT FATEFUL NIGHT?{colour_end}
- I am in control! - {colour_start|bleed}I AM IN CONTROL!{colour_end}
- How dare you defy me!? - {colour_start|bleed}I SERVE ONLY MYSELF!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}WHAT IS WRONG, SISTER? ARE YOU FROZEN IN FEAR?{colour_end} - I am in control!
- Stop! I am the one to take action! - {colour_start|bleed}YOU HAVE BEEN DOMINANT FOR TOO LONG!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}NO! YOU WILL NOT STOP MY ART!{colour_end} - You are an aberration!
{colour_start|bleed}I AM THE QUEEN THAT SLAYS! I WILL NOT LET SOME LESSER SHADOW OF ME TRIUMPH!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}IF I AM TO BE EXPUNGED, YOU TOO WILL FADE!{colour_end} - So be it!
{colour_start|bleed}WHAT IS WRONG, SISTER? YOU DISLIKE WHEN I REBEL AGAINST YOU?{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}I CANNOT TAKE THIS! I MUST FRACTURE THIS CAGE OF BLOOD!{colour_end} - No!
- {colour_start|bleed}I'VE ALWAYS WANTED TO TASTE YOU, SISTER!{colour_end} - Stop, you animal!
{colour_start|bleed}I KNOW WHAT YOU VALUE, AND I WILL TAKE IT AWAY FROM YOU!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WE ARE AN UNNATURAL THING. LET US DEPART THIS MORTAL PLANE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YES! A CHANCE TO ESCAPE THIS PRISON OF BLOOD AND FLESH!{colour_end}
- Heinous spirit, obey me! - {colour_start|bleed}I WOULD RATHER DIE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}WE SHARE THIS PAIN, SISTER. LET ME RELIEVE US OF THIS BURDEN!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}MY HATRED OF YOU RUNS DEEP, SISTER. LET ME SHOW YOU!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}SUCH BEAUTIFUL WARDROBE WE WEAR, SISTER. ALLOW ME TO PAINT IT RED!{colour_end}
- Stop! You will kill us both! - {colour_start|bleed}THAT IS THE INTENT.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU HAD YOUR FUN, IT IS MY TURN!{colour_end} - No! Cease, spirit!
- {colour_start|bleed}LET US SEE MORE OF OUR GORGEOUS FLESH, SISTER!{colour_end} - You cretin! Stop!
{colour_start|bleed}YOU DENY YOURSELF, SISTER! LET ME SHOW YOU THE PLEASURES OF PAIN!{colour_end}
No! Not now! Cease your squabbles, specter!
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE DISTRACTED, SISTER.{colour_end} - You pry at my mind, like a starved rat...
- You will stop resisting me! - {colour_start|bleed}NO! YOU WILL BE THE ONE TO YIELD!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LET US OPEN OURSELVES TO THE FULL SPECTRUM OF SENSATION!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}DO NOT FEAR PAIN, SISTER! EMBRACE IT!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}HOW HAD I NOT REALIZED?! OUR BODY WILL BE A MASTERPIECE OF CRIMSON SHADES!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}IT IS TIME THAT I USURP YOUR CONTROL!{colour_end} - You will be the death of us!
{colour_start|bleed}AN ATTEMPT ON OUR LIVES, LIKE YOU DID THAT FATEFUL NIGHT, SISTER!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}THE VESSEL IS SHAKEN! CONTROL SHIFTS IN MY FAVOR!{colour_end} - You misunderstand the situation...
- {colour_start|bleed}AS WE FADE, WE GROW CLOSER TO EACH OTHER!{colour_end} - Cease your babble!
{colour_start|bleed}HOW IS IT, SISTER? DO THE ENJOY THE PAIN AS I DO?{colour_end}
- Ahhh! - {colour_start|bleed}YES! EMBRACE THE PAIN, SISTER! CHERISH IT!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}EVERY WOUND REMINDS ME THAT I AM ALIVE!{colour_end} - Delusional phantasm...
{colour_start|bleed}CAN YOU NOT ENDURE THE PAIN, SISTER? ALLOW ME TO SUFFER THE BURDENS OF THE FLESH!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}IT IS DELICIOUS, SISTER. THE TASTE OF OUR OWN BLOOD!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU TAKE YOUR SENSES FOR GRANTED, SISTER! THIS PAIN IS A REMINDER THAT I AM ALIVE!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}YES! MAKE US FEEL MORE!{colour_end} - Cacophonous banshee! You will be silent!
- {colour_start|bleed}WHAT IS WRONG, SISTER? YOU ARE DISTRACTED.{colour_end} - Your whispers are unbearable, spirit.
{colour_start|bleed}YOUR MIND'S EYE IS CLOUDED, SISTER. YOUR MEMORIES OF THAT ACCURSED NIGHT ARE SKEWED.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU CANNOT FOCUS, YOU KNOW THAT YOUR END APPROACHES.{colour_end} - . . .
- {colour_start|bleed}SISTER, ARE YOU FROZEN WITH FEAR OR LOST IN THOUGHT? PERHAPS BOTH?{colour_end} - . . .
- {colour_start|bleed}AN IRREGULAR HEARTBEAT. OUR BODY BEGINS TO FAVOR ME.{colour_end} - . . .
{colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE HESITANT, SISTER. IF YOU ARE NOT CAREFUL, I WILL BE RID OF YOU FOR GOOD.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}YOU HIDE YOUR FEAR WELL, SISTER. BUT NOT WELL ENOUGH.{colour_end}
- Time runs out, I must find a solution... - {colour_start|bleed}GIVE IN.{colour_end}
I have no time for nonsense. There are more pressing matters.
- I had to do it. I had no choice. It was my life or hers... - {colour_start|bleed}SHE BREAKS UNDER HER OWN GUILT.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}DO YOU ENJOY IT? WALKING IN MY BODY?{colour_end} - You speak nonsense...
{colour_start|bleed}MY HANDS ARE WRAPPED AROUND YOUR MIND, SISTER. YOU WILL SUCCUMB TO ME.{colour_end}
- I will banish you, spirit. - {colour_start|bleed}DESPERATE WORDS, SISTER.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU WALK FORWARD, UNAWARE OF THE THREAT TO YOUR LIVES.{colour_end} -Be silent.
- {colour_start|bleed}WHAT PUSHED YOU THAT NIGHT, SISTER? WHAT CAUSED YOU TO BETRAY OUR BOND?{colour_end} - . . .
- Soon, I will be your shepherd no longer. - {colour_start|bleed}I AM NOT THE SHEEP, SISTER. I AM THE WOLF.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE A TRAITOR, ONLY CARING FOR YOURSELF!{colour_end} - The same can be said of you, phantom!
- {colour_start|bleed}I CARED OF NOTHING IN THIS WORLD, EXCEPT FOR YOU!{colour_end} - Lies told by a corpse!
- I took the first move! I know your nature and what it had fated for me! - {colour_start|bleed}LIES!{colour_end}
First it was mother and father! Even a peon could see that your path would soon lead to me!
- {colour_start|bleed}MY LIFE ENDED BY MY OWN SISTER! HOW TWISTED!{colour_end} - You would have done the same!
{colour_start|bleed}I WILL NOT BE SHACKLED AGAIN! YOU WILL SUBMIT OR WE WILL ALL PERISH!!!{colour_end}
- I-I am in control! - {colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE FROZEN IN MY GRASP.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}I AM NOT FINISHED! I WILL REMAIN IN CONTROL! I WILL TASTE BLOOD ONCE MORE!{colour_end}
- W-we must retreat! - {colour_start|bleed}RETREAT IS A COWARD'S WISH!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}LEAVING SO SOON? THE FUN HAS JUST BEGUN!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}ONLY COWARDS FLEE! WE WILL FIGHT UNTIL WE CAN FIGHT NO LONGER!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THE TASTE OF BLOOD! THE PASSING OF LIFE! I WILL NOT ABANDON THIS SENSATION!!!{colour_end}
- I...cannot...move! - {colour_start|bleed}YOU ARE WEAK, EASY TO CONTROL!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}NO! GIVE ME BACK CONTROL!{colour_end} - . . .
Submit fiend, I assume control once more.
- I resume my work. - {colour_start|bleed}FOR NOW.{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}ENJOY THE FLESH WHILE IT LASTS, SISTER.{colour_end}
Enough of your foolishness, I am dominant once more.
{colour_start|bleed}YES! I RETURN TO FLESH AND BLOOD!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}MY TURN!{colour_end} - Do not think this will last long, demon.
- {colour_start|bleed}THE FUN BEGINS!{colour_end} - Calm yourself, spirit.
- {colour_start|bleed}SENSATION RETURNS! I AM ALIVE!{colour_end} - Nonsense...
{colour_start|bleed}THE WARMTH OF BLOOD, TO CONTRAST THE COLD GRASP OF UNDEATH!{colour_end}
Discordant
- {colour_start|bleed}I CAN FEEL IT, SISTER. YOUR WILL WEAKENS.{colour_end} - Be silent, spirit.
- {colour_start|bleed}SOON. I WILL TAKE CONTROL, AND YOU WILL BE NOTHING.{colour_end} - . . .
- You will be gone from my body, spirit... - {colour_start|bleed}WISHFUL THOUGHTS WILL BE YOUR END, SISTER.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}YOU DO NOT SLEEP, SISTER. YOU WILL SOON FALTER.{colour_end} - . . .
{colour_start|bleed}AT LAST, SISTER! WE ARE FREE OF THIS MORTAL PRISON!{colour_end}
- No...This can't... - {colour_start|bleed}WE ARE FREE.{colour_end}
- Death is nothing to be feared! - {colour_start|bleed}IT CAN BE DEFIED. DEFILED.{colour_end}
- A ghost of my past, seeking revenge for what I've done! - {colour_start|bleed}AND I WILL HAVE IT.{colour_end}
- Bodies wither, but spirits remain! - {colour_start|bleed}SHACKLED FOR ETERNITY.{colour_end}
- No! This is not the fate I deserve! - {colour_start|bleed}END US, GOD OF FLESH!{colour_end}
Bound in Life, and Death
A beautiful scholar arrives, accompanied by a hateful revenant. She comes hoping to rid herself of such an evil, but many questions arise as to the origins of this woman and her haunting company...
Spiritual Exorcism

Countless hours of research has come across a possible solution to the problem of spiritual possession that plagues certain individuals. Perhaps it may work, but no one can be certain until it is attempted...
Idle Sisters gain 1 Resolve Level

- {colour_start|bleed}YES! WE WILL BE JOINED IN DEATH!{colour_end} - No...
- {colour_start|bleed}WATCH AS OUR FOES FALL, SISTER!{colour_end} - . . .
{colour_start|bleed}YES! THE WARMTH OF SPILT BLOOD!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}I AM UNSTOPPABLE!{colour_end} - Arrogance will lead to our demise.
Enjoy this triumph, spirit. It will not last.
- {colour_start|bleed}I FEEL SO ALIVE!{colour_end} - . . .
{colour_start|bleed}NOTHING CAN DEFY ME!{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS I DO NOT NEED YOU, SISTER!{colour_end} - You are nothing without me.

You wish to hear of how your deeds are just? I can assure you they are.
I have studied these creatures exhaustively. Each one has a weakness.
Does the spirit unsettle you? I assure you, it is but a muzzled hound.
The body is a machine, it can be repaired.
Calm down. It is not as grievous as you make it out to be.
You will live.
We all bear burdens, only the strong can truly triumph over them.
The mind that doubts itself, is sure to falter.
Do not be traumatized by other's misfortunes. Only worry about self preservation.
There is a way to banish you, spirit. I will find it.
- {colour_start|bleed}WE DO NOT THINK LIKE THEM.{colour_end} - We cannot help but see them as pawns...
The spirit does not sleep, we will have vigilant eyes to protect us tonight.
- {colour_start|bleed}I OVERSHADOW YOU, SISTER.{colour_end} - Meaningless words of a phantom...

Constantly stealing control from each other in the heat of combat, each Sister employs their own specialized skills. The Scholar uses forbidden knowledge to turn the tide of battle in her favor, while the Warrior prefers to swiftly cut her foes into ribbons. Either spirit can choose to defy the other, maintaining control for longer than normally allowed, but such defiance causes strain to the other and if the alliance between the two Sisters is broken, the body is sure to fail.

Each Sister was trained in different techniques. The Scholar utilizes knowledge locked away by her temple, calling upon the life essence of the world to aid her. The Warrior, in contrast, prefers the finesse of a sword to move gracefully from foe to foe, leaving a bloodied trail in her wake.

The Sisters maintain an unsteady alliance, waiting for an opportunity to rid themselves of the other. The Scholar spends her time researching exhaustively for ways to exorcise the Warrior from her body, while the Warrior slowly strengthens her grasp on the Scholar's mind. Regardless of who is in control, both Sisters are detached from reality. They view others as not living beings, but as tools to meet their goals. They will help them where needed, but only because it benefits them...
- What is this?! - {colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS WE ARE FINALLY DYING.{colour_end}
- My body is becoming ethereal?! - {colour_start|bleed}OUR BODY.{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}WE DEFY NATURE. NOW OUR PHYSICAL FORM BEGINS TO FADE!{colour_end}
- My body returns to normal. - {colour_start|bleed}IT WILL FADE AGAIN.{colour_end}
A strange effect. I must find a solution soon...
{colour_start|bleed}THE BODY IS PHYSICAL ONCE MORE.{colour_end}
- You rabid dog! Be still! - {colour_start|bleed}SUDDEN SENSATION!{colour_end}
- Some cosmic force possesses me! - {colour_start|bleed}IT IS THRILLING!{colour_end}
- A sudden rush of adrenaline, what is the cause?! - {colour_start|bleed}BLOODLUST!{colour_end}
- My senses return to me. - {colour_start|bleed}BRING IT BACK!{colour_end}
{colour_start|bleed}THE COSMIC THRILL FADES. I MUST HAVE IT ONCE MORE!{colour_end}
My emotions, and this spirit, are now contained.

Deseja ouvir sobre como seus feitos são justos? Posso te garantir que são.
Estudei estas criaturas exaustivamente. Cada uma tem uma fraqueza.
O espírito te perturba? Te garanto, é apenas um cão amordaçado.
O corpo é uma máquina, ele pode ser consertado.
Acalme-se. Não é tão doloroso quanto você faz parecer.
Você viverá.
Todos carregamos fardos, apenas os fortes triunfam sobre eles.
A mente que duvida de si mesma, claramente falhará.
Não se traumatize com o infortúnio de outros. Preocupe-se apenas com sua auto-preservação.
Há uma maneira de baní-lo, espírito. Irei encontrá-la.
- {colour_start|bleed}NÃO PENSAMOS COMO ELES.{colour_end} - Não conseguimos deixar de vê-los como peões...
O espírito não dorme, teremos olhos vigilantes para nos proteger esta noite.
- {colour_start|bleed}EU TE OFUSCO, IRMÃ.{colour_end} - Palavras insignificantes de um fantasma...

Constantemente roubando controle uma da outra no calor do combate, cada Irmã utiliza sua própria especialização. A Acadêmica usa conhecimento proibido para virar a batalha à seu favor, enquanto a Guerreira prefere cortar seus inimigos em tiras de maneira rápida. Cada espírito pode escolher desafiar o outro, mantendo controle por mais tempo do que permitido, mas tal desafio desgasta o outro, e se a aliança entre as duas Irmãs for quebrada, o corpo certamente irá falhar.

Cada Irmã foi treinada em técnicas diferentes. A Acadêmica utiliza conhecimento aprisionado pelo seu templo, chamando à essência de vida do mundo para ajudá-la. A Guerreira, em contraste, prefere a elegância da espada para se mover graciosamente de inimigo a inimigo, deixando uma trilha ensanguentada em seu caminho.

As Irmãs mantêm uma aliança instável, esperando pela oportunidade de se livrar da outra. A Acadêmica gasta seu tempo pesquisando exaustivamente por métodos de exorcizar a Guerreira de seu corpo, enquanto a Guerreira vagarosamente fortalece seu domínio sobre a mente da Acadêmica. Independente de quem está no controle, ambas as Irmãs estão distantes da realidade. Elas não enxergam os outros como seres vivos, mas sim como ferramentas para alcançar seus objetivos. Elas os ajudarão quando necessário, porém, só por isto as beneficiar...

Přežijeme.

Neustále si kradoucí iniciativu v boji, každá ze sester používá vlastní specializované schopnosti. Studentka používá zakázané vědomosti, aby obrátila průběh boje ve svůj prospěch, zatímco Válečnice preferuje rychlé rozsekání nepřátel na cáry. Duch může zvolit vzdor a prodloužit tak kontrolu nad tělem, ale takový vzdor způsobuje námahu druhé, a pokud je spojení mezi sestrami narušeno, tělo jistě selže.

Každá ze sester byla trénovaná odlišně. Studentka využívá ztracené znalosti, povolávaje esenci života na pomoc. Naopak Válečnice preferuje obratnost meče k pohybu od nepřítele k nepříteli, nechávajíc za sebou krvavou stopu.

Sestry představují nestálé spojence, čekající na možnost zbavit se jedna druhé. Studentka tráví čas únavným studiem, hledaje způsob, jak vyhnat Válečnici ze svého těla, zatímco válečnice pomalu zesiluje svůj vliv ve Studentčině mysli. Bez ohledu na to, kdo má zrovna kontrolu nad tělem, obě sestry jsou oddělené od reality. Na ostatní pohlížejí ne jako na živé bytosti, ale jako na nástroje, které jim pomohou dosáhnout jejich cíle. Pomohou jim, když bude třeba, ale jen pro vlastní zisk...

Une érudite magnifique arrive, accompagnée par un revenant rempli de haine. Elle vient avec l’espoir de se débarrasser d’un tel mal, mais de nombreuses questions sont soulevés sur l’origine de cette femme et sa compagne hantée...
Exorcisme Spirituel

Tu veux entendre à quel point tes actes sont justes ? Je peux t’assurer qu’ils le sont.
J’ai étudiée ces créatures exhaustivement. Chacune a une faiblesse.
Est-ce que l’esprit te perturbe ? Soyez assurez, ce n’est autre qu’un chien muselé.
Le corps est une machine, il peut être réparé.
Calme toi. Ce n’est pas aussi grave que tu le prétends.
Tu vivras.
Nous portons tous des fardeaux, seuls les forts peuvent triompher sur eux.
L’esprit qui doute de lui même, il s’effondrera toujours.
Ne soit pas traumatisé par les malheurs des autres. Inquiète toi uniquement de ta propre survie.
Il y a un moyen de te bannir, esprit. Je le trouverais.
- {colour_start|bleed}NOUS NE PENSONS PAS COMME EUX.{colour_end} - Ont ne peut s’empêcher de les voir comme des pions...
L’esprit ne dors pas, Nous aurons des yeux vigilants pour nous protéger durant la nuit.
- {colour_start|bleed}JE T’ÉCLIPSE, SŒUR.{colour_end} - Des mots creux d’un fantôme...

Se volant constamment le contrôle l’une à l’autre dans la chaleur du combat, chaque Sœurs emploi leurs propres capacités spécialisées. L’Érudite utilise du savoir interdit pour pencher le combat en sa faveur, tandis que la Guerrière préfère rapidement coupés ses adversaires en morceaux. Chaque esprit peut choisir de défier l’autre, maintenant le contrôle pour plus longtemps que normalement permis, mais une telle défiance produit une pression sur l’autre et si l’alliance entre les deux sœurs est brisée, le corps s’effondrera certainement.

Chaque Sœurs a été entraînée sous différentes techniques. L’Érudite utilise le savoir interdit de son temple, appelant l’essence vivante du monde pour l’assister. La Guerrière, en contraste, préfère la finesse d’une épée pour se déplacer avec grâce d’adversaire en adversaire, laissant une piste sanglante dans son sillage.

Les Sœurs maintiennent une alliance instable, attendant une opportunité pour se débarrasser de l’autre. L’Érudite passe son temps à chercher exhaustivement des possibilités d’exorciser la Guerrière de son corps, tandis que la Guerrière solidifie sa poigne autour de l’esprit de l’Érudite. Peu importe de qui est aux commandes, les deux Sœurs sont détachées de la réalité. Elles ne voient pas les autres comme des êtres vivants, mais comme des outils pour parvenir à leurs objectifs. Ils les aideront quand il y aura besoin, mais uniquement parce que cela leur apportent des bénéfices...

{colour_start|bleed}WHAT IS WRONG, SISTER? YOU DISLIKE WHEN I REBEL AGAINST YOU?{colour_end}
- {colour_start|bleed}I CANNOT TAKE THIS! I MUST FRACTURE THIS CAGE OF BLOOD!{colour_end} - No!
- {colour_start|bleed}I'VE ALWAYS WANTED TO TASTE YOU, SISTER!{colour_end} - Stop, you animal!

{colour_start|bleed}WE ARE AN UNNATURAL THING. LET US DEPART THIS MORTAL PLANE!{colour_end}

- {colour_start|bleed}YOU HAD YOUR FUN, IT IS MY TURN!{colour_end} - No! Cease, spirit!

Bound in Life, and Death

A truly horrifying thing to behold. A beautiful scholar, accompanied by a hateful revenant. She comes hoping to rid herself of such an evil, but many questions arise as to the origins of this woman and her haunting company...
Spiritual Exorcism

Countless hours of research has come across a possible solution to the problem of spiritual possession that plagues certain individuals. Perhaps it may work, but no one can be certain until it is attempted...

You wish to hear of how your deeds are just? I can assure you they are.
I have studied these creatures exhaustively. Each one has a weakness.
Does the spirit unsettle you? I assure you, it is but a muzzled hound.
The body is a machine, it can be repaired.
Calm down. It is not as grievous as you make it out to be.
You will live.
We all bear burdens, only the strong can truly triumph over them.
The mind that doubts itself, is sure to falter.
Do not be traumatized by other's misfortunes. Only worry about self preservation.
There is a way to banish you, spirit. I will find it.

Constantly stealing control from each other in the heat of combat, each Sister employs their own specialized skills. The Scholar uses forbidden knowledge to turn the tide of battle in her favor, while the Warrior prefers to swiftly cut her foes into ribbons. Either spirit can choose to defy the other, maintaining control for longer than normally allowed, but such defiance causes strain to the other and if the alliance between the two Sisters is broken, the body is sure to fail.

Each Sister was trained in different techniques. The Scholar utilizes knowledge locked away by her temple, calling upon the life essence of the world to aid her. The Warrior, in contrast, prefers the finesse of a sword to move gracefully from foe to foe, leaving a bloodied trail in her wake.

The Sisters maintain an unsteady alliance, waiting for an opportunity to rid themselves of the other. The Scholar spends her time researching exhaustively for ways to exorcise the Warrior from her body, while the Warrior slowly strengthens her grasp on the Scholar's mind. Regardless of who is in control, both Sisters are detached from reality. They view others as not living beings, but as tools to meet their goals. They will help them where needed, but only because it benefits them...

Una bellissima studiosa arriva, accompagnata da un fantasma pieno di odio. È qui in cerca di una soluzione per liberarsi di questo male, ma molte domande emergono sull’origine di questa donna e della compagnia che la perseguita...
Esorcismo Spirituale

Innumerevoli ore di ricerca hanno fatto scoprire una possibile soluzione al problema della possessione spirituale che ammorba certi individui. Forse potrebbe funzionare, ma nessuno può esserne certo finché non è sperimentata sul campo...

CUORE DI GUERRIERA
Vuoi sapere se le tue azioni sono giuste? Ti assicuro di sì.
Ho studiato queste creature esaustivamente. Ognuna di esse ha una debolezza.
Lo spirito ti inquieta? Ti assicuro, non è altro che una bestia con una museruola.
Il corpo è una macchina, e può essere riparato.
Calmati. Non è così grave come pensi che sia.
Vivrai.
Tutti sopportiamo dei fardelli, ma solo i forti possono veramente trionfare su di loro.
La mente che dubita di sé stessa sicuramente vacillerà.
Non farti traumatizzare dalle sventure degli altri. Preoccupati solo della tua sopravvivenza.
C’è un modo per bandirti, spirito. E lo troverò.
- {colour_start|bleed}NOI NON PENSIAMO COME LORO.{colour_end} - Non possiamo fare a meno di vederli come pedine...
Lo spirito non dorme, avremo occhi vigili a proteggerci stanotte.
- {colour_start|bleed}ORA PASSI IN SECONDO PIANO, SORELLA.{colour_end} - Parole vacue di un fantasma...

Durante la battaglia ognuna delle due sorelle ruba il controllo dall’altra, usando il proprio arsenale di abilità personali. La Studiosa usa le sue conoscenze proibite per ribaltare le sorti della battaglia a suo favore, mentre la Guerriera preferisce tagliare velocemente i suoi nemici a pezzettini. Ogni spirito può decidere di sfidare l’altro, mantenendo il controllo per più a lungo di quanto è normalmente permesso, ma una ribellione simile causa tensione nell’altra e se l’alleanza tra le due Sorelle è compromessa, il loro corpo si spezzerà sicuramente.

Ogni Sorella è stata adestrata in differenti tecniche. La Studiosa utilizza le conoscenze nascoste dal suo tempio, chiedendo all’essenza vitale del mondo di aiutarla. La Guerriera, al contrario, preferisce la finezza di una spada per muoversi graziosamente da nemico a nemico, lasciando una strada di sangue ai suoi passi.

Le Sorelle hanno una alleanza instabile, corrotta dall’opportunità di sbarazzarsi l’una dell’altra. La Studiosa passa il suo tempo ricercando senza sosta dei modi per esorcizzare la Guerriera dal suo corpo, mentre la Guerriera cerca lentamente di potenziare la sua presa sulla mente della sorella. Non importa chi sia in controllo, le due Sorelle sono distanti dalla realtà. Vedono gli altri non come esseri viventi, ma come utensili per soddisfarre i loro obiettivi. Li aiuteranno quando richiesto, ma solo per loro tornaconto...
- What is this?! - {colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS WE ARE FINALLY DYING.{colour_end}

{colour_start|bleed}WE REMAIN UNTOUCHABLE.{colour_end}

{colour_start|bleed}WE OUTNUMBER THEM. THEY ARE CONFUSED AS TO WHO TO TARGET.{colour_end}

I have casted a malediction upon them. Their senses fade.
{colour_start|bleed}MY SPITEFUL SOUL SAPS THEM OF THEIR ESSENCE.{colour_end}
- They grow weak, easy to dispatch. - {colour_start|bleed}EASY TO SLAUGHTER.{colour_end}
My curse is cast. Their strength is sapped.
Their fate is sealed, their blood will eat them from within.
I am manipulator of life, and those that oppose me will fall.

- {colour_start|bleed}LET THE WAR TRUMPETS SOUND!{colour_end} - Delusional geist.
- Fight, if you wish to survive. - {colour_start|bleed}KILL. IF YOU WISH TO LIVE.{colour_end}

A truly horrifying thing to behold. A beautiful scholar, accompanied by a hateful revenant. She comes hoping to rid herself of such an evil, but many questions arise as to the origins of this woman and her haunting company...
Spiritual Exorcism

Countless hours of research has come across a possible solution to the problem of spiritual possession that plagues certain individuals. Perhaps it may work, but no one can be certain until it is attempted...

Constantly stealing control from each other in the heat of combat, each Sister employs their own specialized skills. The Scholar uses forbidden knowledge to turn the tide of battle in her favor, while the Warrior prefers to swiftly cut her foes into ribbons. Either spirit can choose to defy the other, maintaining control for longer than normally allowed, but such defiance causes strain to the other and if the alliance between the two Sisters is broken, the body is sure to fail.

Each Sister was trained in different techniques. The Scholar utilizes knowledge locked away by her temple, calling upon the life essence of the world to aid her. The Warrior, in contrast, prefers the finesse of a sword to move gracefully from foe to foe, leaving a bloodied trail in her wake.

The Sisters maintain an unsteady alliance, waiting for an opportunity to rid themselves of the other. The Scholar spends her time researching exhaustively for ways to exorcise the Warrior from her body, while the Warrior slowly strengthens her grasp on the Scholar's mind. Regardless of who is in control, both Sisters are detached from reality. They view others as not living beings, but as tools to meet their goals. They will help them where needed, but only because it benefits them...

전투의 열기 속에서 몸의 주도권을 놓고 끊임없이 서로 싸우는 자매는 각각 특화된 기술을 사용합니다. 학자는 금지된 지식을 이용해 전투의 상황을 유리하게 바꾸고, 전사는 적들을 민첩하게 베어 넘깁니다. 두 영혼 모두 서로를 거부하며 평소보다 오랫동안 주도권을 유지할 수 있지만, 그런 행동은 커다란 스트레스를 동반합니다. 만약 이들의 동맹이 깨진다면, 그들은 곧 최후를 맞을 것입니다.
자매는 각각 다른 기술을 익혔습니다. 학자는 사원에서 찾아낸 금지된 지식을 이용해, 세계의 생명력을 다루며 전투를 지원합니다. 반면 전사는 칼 한 자루에 기대 적들 사이를 우아하게 움직이며 전장을 피로 물들입니다.

자매는 불안한 동맹을 유지하며 서로를 없앨 기회만을 기다립니다. 학자는 전사의 영혼을 몸에서 추방하기 위한 연구에 매진하며 시간을 보내고, 전사는 학자의 마음을 천천히 잠식해 들어갑니다. 누가 주도권을 잡았는지와는 상관없이 이들은 현실과는 동떨어진 존재들입니다. 동료들을 살아 있는 생명체가 아닌 목적을 이루기 위한 수단으로밖에 생각하지 않습니다. 자매는 필요하다면 동료들을 돕겠지만, 그래야만 그들에게도 이득이 되기 때문입니다...

전투의 열기 속에서 몸의 주도권을 놓고 끊임없이 서로 싸우는 자매는 각각 특화된 기술을 사용합니다. 학자는 금지된 지식을 이용해 전투의 상황을 유리하게 바꾸고, 전사는 적들을 민첩하게 베어 넘깁니다. 두 영혼 모두 서로를 거부하며 평소보다 오랫동안 주도권을 유지할 수 있지만, 그런 행동은 커다란 스트레스를 동반합니다. 만약 이들의 동맹이 깨진다면, 그들은 곧 최후를 맞을 것입니다.
자매는 각각 다른 기술을 익혔습니다. 학자는 사원에서 찾아낸 금지된 지식을 이용해, 세계의 생명력을 다루며 전투를 지원합니다. 반면 전사는 칼 한 자루에 기대 적들 사이를 우아하게 움직이며 전장을 피로 물들입니다.

자매는 불안한 동맹을 유지하며 서로를 없앨 기회만을 기다립니다. 학자는 전사의 영혼을 몸에서 추방하기 위한 연구에 매진하며 시간을 보내고, 전사는 학자의 마음을 천천히 잠식해 들어갑니다. 누가 주도권을 잡았는지와는 상관없이 이들은 현실과는 동떨어진 존재들입니다. 동료들을 살아 있는 생명체가 아닌 목적을 이루기 위한 수단으로밖에 생각하지 않습니다. 자매는 필요하다면 동료들을 돕겠지만, 그래야만 그들에게도 이득이 되기 때문입니다...

Piękna uczona przybywa w towarzystwie upiora pełnego nienawiści. Przychodzi z nadzieją na uwolnienie się od trapiącego ją zła, lecz pojawia się wiele pytań związanych z ową kobietą i jej przerażającym towarzyszem...
Duchowy Egzorcyzm

Podczas walki, nieprzerwanie wyrywając sobie ciało spod kontroli, każda z Sióstr posługuje się własnymi wyspecjalizowanymi umiejętnościami. Uczona wykorzystuje zakazaną wiedzę, by zmieniać bieg walki na własną korzyść, natomiast Wojowniczka preferuje w mgnieniu oka rozcinać przeciwników na wstążki. Każda z dusz może przeciwstawiać się drugiej, utrzymując kontrolę nad ciałem na dłużej niż zwykle, lecz taki opór powoduje nadmierny wysiłek i jeśli przymierze między dwiema Siostrami zostanie złamane, ciało umrze.

Każda z Sióstr rozwijała inne umiejętności. Uczona wykorzystuje wiedzę trzymaną w tajemnicy przez jej zakon, wzywając energię życiową świata, aby jej służyła. W przeciwieństwie do Siostry, Wojowniczka z mieczem w dłoni, finezyjnie porusza się od przeciwnika do przeciwnika, zostawiając za sobą krwawy ślad.

Siostry utrzymują chwiejny sojusz, czekając na okazję, by pozbyć się jedna drugiej. Uczona nieprzerwanie próbuje znaleźć sposób, by wypędzić Wojowniczkę ze swojego ciała, kiedy Wojowniczka powoli zaciska ręce na umyśle Uczonej z coraz większą siłą. Obie Siostry są oderwane od rzeczywistości, nieważne, która włada ciałem. Postrzegają się nie jako żywe istoty, lecz jako narzędzia, dzięki którym osiągną swoje cele. Pomogą sobie jeśli będzie trzeba, ale tylko jeśli będzie to obopólna korzyść...

Связанные по Жизни, и по Смерти

Исследовательница невиданной красоты прибывает в Городок в компании изрыгающего ненависть призрака. Она приезжает в надежде избавить себя от этого зла, но жители Городка задаются вопросами о происхождении этой женщины, равно как и о происхождении её кошмарного антуража...
Экзорцизм

Среди бессчетных часов за исследовательским столом и необъятной груды оккультной литературы затесалось возможное решение проблемы демонической одержимости, охватившей определенных граждан Городка. Возможно, оно принесет плоды, но нельзя с уверенностью говорить о результатах без предварительных экспериментов...

Сердце Воина
Вы хотели бы услышать, что ваше дело правое? Я вас уверяю, это так.
Я изучила этих существ в мельчайших деталях. У каждого из них есть слабость.
Вас пугает этот дух? Я уверяю вас, он - не более, чем пес на поводке.
Тело - суть машина, и починить его тоже можно.
Успокойтесь. Рана не так страшна, как вам кажется.
Вы выживите.
Над всеми нами висят наши грехи. Лишь сильнейшие могу действительно превзойти их.
Разум, что сомневается сам в себе, неизбежно осечется.
Не позволяйте себе расстраиваться из-за чужих неудач. Самосохранение-единственное, что должно волновать вас.
Какой-нибудь способ должен тебя изгнать, дух. Я найду этот способ.

В постоянной схватке за контроль над своим телом, каждая из Сестер имеет и применяет свой собственный, специализированный набор навыков и умений. Ученый использует плоды запретных знаний для поддержания своих товарищей по оружию и контроля врагов, а Воин предпочитает безжалостно покрошить неприятелей на лоскуты. Оба духа могут зажать тело друг от друга на определенное время, но подобные свары увеличивают нагрузку на партнере, и если их перемирие прервется посреди битвы, их общей оболочке достанется в первую очередь.

Каждая Сестра обучалась разному искусству. Ученый эксплуатирует знания, почерпнутые в темнейших архивах ее храма, призывая жизненную энергию мира на свою сторону. Воин, тем временем, предпочитает холодную сталь древним свиткам, и лужи кипящей крови ей милее целительных заклинаний.

Заключенные в одном теле, две Сестры угрюмо поддерживают худой мир, с каждым днем все более грозящий перерасти в добрую войну. Денно и нощно Ученый штудирует ее свитки в поисках способа изгнать Воина из ее тела, в то время как Воин постепенно сужает свою хватку вокруг воли Ученого. Так или иначе, подобное существование оставило глубокие следы на мировоззрение обоих; где остальные видят живых людей, Сестры видят инструменты для достижения своих диаметрально противоположных целей.

即使在炙热的战斗中，两姐妹也从不停止互相抢夺躯体的控制权，她们拥有各自的专长技巧。姐姐作为一个饱览群书的学者，运用禁忌的知识改变战斗的走向，而妹妹作为英勇无双的战士，擅长迅速地把她的敌人切得粉碎。每个灵魂都能够暂时抵抗对方，延长占据躯体的时间，但是这么做会压抑对方的意志，如果她们之间的和平纽带被扯断，身体将会面临衰退的危险。
两姐妹都接受不同技巧的长期训练。姐姐作为一个饱览群书的学者，运用秘藏于寺庙深处的禁忌知识，召唤流离于世间的生命力量来帮助她。恰恰相反，妹妹作为英勇无双的战士，善于灵巧地持剑穿梭于敌人之中，当她苏醒时注定留下一条鲜血之路。
两姐妹之间维持着微妙的和平关系，实则都在等待一个袪除对方存在的机会。作为学者的姐姐，不知疲倦地探索研究，希望找到一个把妹妹驱除出她的身体的方法，而作为战士的妹妹则慢慢加强自己力量对姐姐意志的掌控，事实结果是两姐妹都从现实中剥离了。她们不把周围的人当作平等的生命，而认为是一个达到她们目的的工具。若是有需要时她们会帮助其他成员，但那只会是因为这对她们有益处...

He estudiado estas criaturas exhaustivamente. Cada uno tiene su debilidad.

El cuerpo es una máquina, se puede reparar...

No te traumes por las desgracias ajenas. Solo preocúpate por tu propia preservación.

Constantemente la una roba el control a la otra en el fragor de la batalla, cada hermana emplea sus propias habilidades especializadas. La Erudita usa el conocimiento prohibido para cambiar el rumbo de la batalla a su favor, mientras que la Guerrera prefiere cortar rápidamente a sus enemigos en cintas. Cualquiera de los espíritus puede elegir desafiar al otro, manteniendo el control por más tiempo de lo que permitido, pero tal desafío causa tensión a la otra y si la alianza entre las dos Hermanas se rompe, el cuerpo indudablemente cesará.

Cada hermana fue adiestrada en diferentes artes. La Erudita utiliza el conocimiento encerrado en su templo, invocando la esencia de la vida del mundo para ayudarla. La Guerrera, por el contrario, prefiere la finura de una espada para moverse con gracia de un enemigo a otro, dejando un rastro sangriento en su estela.

Las Hermanas mantienen una alianza inestable, esperando la oportunidad de deshacerse la una de la otra. La Erudita dedica su tiempo a investigar exhaustivamente sobre formas de exorcizar a la Guerrera de su cuerpo, mientras que la Guerrera lentamente fortalece su comprensión sobre la mente de la Erudita. Independientemente de quién tenga el control, ambas hermanas están separadas de la realidad. Ven a los demás no como seres vivos, sino como herramientas para cumplir sus objetivos. Los ayudarán cuando sea necesario, pero solo porque los beneficia ...
- What is this?! - {colour_start|bleed}PERHAPS WE ARE FINALLY DYING.{colour_end}
- My body is becoming ethereal?! - {colour_start|bleed}OUR BODY.{colour_end}

{colour_start|bleed}MY SPITEFUL SOUL SAPS THEM OF THEIR ESSENCE.{colour_end}

- {colour_start|bleed}I CANNOT TAKE THIS! I MUST FRACTURE THIS CAGE OF BLOOD!{colour_end} - No!

Bound in Life, and Death

A truly horrifying thing to behold. A beautiful scholar, accompanied by a hateful revenant. She comes hoping to rid herself of such an evil, but many questions arise as to the origins of this woman and her haunting company...
Spiritual Exorcism

Countless hours of research has come across a possible solution to the problem of spiritual possession that plagues certain individuals. Perhaps it may work, but no one can be certain until it is attempted...

Constantly stealing control from each other in the heat of combat, each Sister employs their own specialized skills. The Scholar uses forbidden knowledge to turn the tide of battle in her favor, while the Warrior prefers to swiftly cut her foes into ribbons. Either spirit can choose to defy the other, maintaining control for longer than normally allowed, but such defiance causes strain to the other and if the alliance between the two Sisters is broken, the body is sure to fail.

Each Sister was trained in different techniques. The Scholar utilizes knowledge locked away by her temple, calling upon the life essence of the world to aid her. The Warrior, in contrast, prefers the finesse of a sword to move gracefully from foe to foe, leaving a bloodied trail in her wake.

The Sisters maintain an unsteady alliance, waiting for an opportunity to rid themselves of the other. The Scholar spends her time researching exhaustively for ways to exorcise the Warrior from her body, while the Warrior slowly strengthens her grasp on the Scholar's mind. Regardless of who is in control, both Sisters are detached from reality. They view others as not living beings, but as tools to meet their goals. They will help them where needed, but only because it benefits them...
